articles.author: CGTN
articles.title: 14 percent of Americans suffered from long COVID: study - CGTN
articles.description: Approximately 14 percent of the U.S. population suffered from long COVID at some point, according to a research article published in the journal PLOS One, titled "Long COVID in the United States."
articles.content:
Approximately 14 percent of the U.S. population suffered from long COVID at some point, according to a research article published in the journal PLOS One, titled "Long COVID in the United States."
